snippet: Three years after the unsolved murder of her children’s father, Simone McCray has made her peace with what happened, and is doing her best to fulfill his hopes for the children.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York secures funds for Simone McCray of the Bronx to help cover her child care costs as she attends business skills classes.
lead_paragraph: Three years after the unsolved murder of her children’s father, Simone McCray has made her peace with what happened, and is doing her best to fulfill his hopes for the children.

headline.print_headline: After a Partner’s Death, Still Focused on the Children
